title: The Collected Angel S1 (Dark Horse|1999-2001|Digital-1280|Empyr)
description:
"In each of us, two natures are at war - the good and the evil. All our lives
   the fight goes on between them, and one of them must conquer. But in our own
   hands lies the power to choose - what we want most to be, we are"

    - Robert Louis Stevenson, as quoted in "Angel, Season One, Issue Four"


---


Contains (cf sections 1.1 - 1.3 of <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel_Comics" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel_Comics</a>  ):


THE HOLLOWER - Original digital single-volume edition, part of Dark Horse's "Buffy Classic" re-release project, repackaged in order to append a variant cover extracted from a secondary digital volume. OCD FTW!

SEASON ONE - Digital re-releases of Dark Horse's 1999-2001 17-issue run of "Angel", plus two independently-scanned cross-over issues of Dark Horse's concurrent run of "Buffy", compiled into 6 pseudo-TPBs plus 3 single issues per narrative continuity.

LONG NIGHT'S JOURNEY - Digital re-releases of Dark Horse's 2001 4-issue mini-series, also compiled into one. Unlike the previous instalments, this one was actually co-written by Whedon himself.
